author: USA TODAY, Scott Gleeson, USA TODAY
title: Former March Madness phenom Sister Jean returns, urges people to stay home amid coronavirus
description: Sister Jean, 100, was a March Madness star in the 2018 NCAA tournament as Loyola-Chicago made the Final Four. She's now in a coronavirus PSA.
content:
Last SlideNext Slide
Sister Jean Dolores-Schmidt became a March Madness star in 2018 during Loyola-Chicago's Cinderella run in the NCAA tournament, when the Ramblers reached the Final Four as a No. 11 seed. 
She was with the team in four huge tournament ups… [+1602 chars]
